title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. G, pt. 87 - Exhibits For Gas Transmission
content:

State Regulations
§ 87.1 - Exhibit g-1: total gas supply
§ 87.2 - Exhibit g-2: market data
§ 87.3 - Exhibit g-3: revenues; expenses; income
§ 87.4 - Exhibit g-4: construction of the facility

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 16, ch. I, subch. G, pt. 87

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
